name: Conspiracy Cruise
description:
Jump into a boat and fight with not so fake news as your score rises and the game gets harder. There´s always news in Honest News!

INSTRUCTIONS:
WASD - move
Mouse - aim
Left click - basic attack
Right click - hold until sparks appear, release for an anti-ground missile
Space - dash
Esc - back to menu
Enemies - avoid
News - turn into fake news
